damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Usually piloted by the exiled Badmek who built it, a Morkanaut is a hulking combat walker with a dash of Mork-esque know-wotz applied. Packed with all manner of glowy gubbinz, Morkanauts unleash their arsenals of bizarre and deadly weapons in what their pilots think of as displays of pure kunnin’ worthy of Mork.

otherAbilities.Clankin’ Forward:: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.
otherAbilities.Big an’ Shooty:: Each time this model makes a ranged attack during the battle round in which you called a Waaagh! , add 1 to the Hit roll .
